title: 神様家族
resume: Kamisama Kazoku is an anime series based on a series of light novels by Yoshikazu Kuwashima, which premiered May 18, 2006 in Japan across the anime satellite television network Animax. The original light novel series has concluded with 8 volumes; however, a sequel light novel series titled Kamisama Kazoku Z was released on January 25, 2008.
